titles: The nevv letanie. From an extemporary prayer, and a godly ditty, ...
notes: A ballad in the form of a mock litany, in support of the royalist cause.
Title from caption and first line of verse. "From an extemporary prayer, and a godly ditty,"...
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Royalists --  England --  Humor --  Early works to 1800.
